problem: 如图,直线a∥b,直角三角形ABC的顶点B在直线a上,∠C=90°,∠β=55°,则∠α的度数为()
answer: 试题分析:首先过点C作CE//a,可得CE//a//b,然后根据两直线平行,内错角相等,即可求得答案.过点C作CE//a,∵a//b,∴CE//a//b,∴∠BCE=∠α,∠ACE=∠β=55°,∵∠C=90°,∴∠α=∠BCE=∠ABC-∠ACE=35°.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the line a ∥ b, the vertex B of the right triangle ABC is on the line a, ∠C = N_0, ∠β = N_1, then the degree of ∠α is ()
